mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tb.*, ROWNUM rNum FROM ( SELECT p.ProductName, p.DiscountPrice, m.Name, m.PhoneNumber, m.Points, o.orderAmount, m.Email, m.memberNo, m.address, p.productImg, p.wine, p.country, o.orderStatus FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Member m ON o.MemberNo = m.MemberNo INNER JOIN Product p ON o.ProductNo = p.ProductNo ) tb ) WHERE memberNo = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Order_users ( order_usersNo, name, email, phoneNumber, address, orderRequest, discountPrice, orderAmount, points, finalPrice, memberNo, receiverName, receiverPhone, receiverAddress ) VALUES ( order_users_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{orderRequest}, #{discountPrice}, #{orderAmount}, #{points}, #{finish_price_span}, 2, #{re_name}, #{re_hp}, #{re_address} )
